```{R}
#|label: clustering

result <- phytoclass::Cluster(
  pigment_df,
  params$minSamplesPerCluster
)
```

```{R}
fname = params$outputFile
saveRDS(result, file=fname)
print(glue("cluster result saved to file {fname} on the server."))
```
